Sacrifice a land: Return Trynwood Hermit from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
notes:

Whenever Trynwood Hermit blocks or is blocked by a creature, Trynwood Hermit deals 1 damage to that creature. > Sacrifice a land: Return Trynwood Hermit from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
